revised_title: Pharmacological Analysis and Effects of Indaconitine and Bikhaconitine
tldr: This article examines the physiological action and pharmacology of two new alkaloids, indaconitine and bikhaconitine, isolated from Indian aconite plants. The study compares their effects on blood pressure, pulse, and respiration in anesthetized animals, finding similarities with the effects of aconitine from European aconite. The authors also explore the antidotal effects of atropine on indaconitine and discuss the lethal doses of these alkaloids.
